doc.title: Kicker
doc.plot: It's dark and a shiny red soccer player from a soccer table wakes up. He notices the ball and he feels the urge to get near to it. But what can he do? He tries to touch it with his plastic feet, but the ball still seems miles away. Suddenly he remembers it. He can get to it by shuffling the rod. The rod squeaks so much he awakes another midfielder and another player. Teammates and opponents all are ready for action. The red soccer player start a combination with another player. Their only target: the goal. Let the games begin!
